    • Method Detail

      • attack

        public void attack(App gameboard,
                   Player player,
                   TileObject agentTile)
        Defines the attacks this beetle performs. Beetles extends Enemy attack behaviours. In addition, it removes the filled grass tiles upon collision. See Enemy.attack(App, Player, TileObject).
        Overrides:
        attack in class Enemy
        Parameters:
        gameboard - the current gameboard (i.e.App)
        player - the player in this game instance
        agentTile - this enemy's tile
